descriptionHtml:
UPDATE 1.2
New Dragonblood Mine added!
Added 4 more mannequins to sanctuary.
Added a stairway down the back balcony.
Changed the dragon eyes on the front entrance. 
YOU WILL NEED TO RE-DISCOVER THE ENTRANCES!! I fixed them so they needed to be discovered like everything else.

UPDATE 1.1
Fixed a couple issues with the lava and lighting. Download The Dragonblood Throne Updated file. Version 1.1


New video review from Blacks Mod Reviews! Thank you for your support!
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zgzt96W2PSA&feature=c4-overview&list=UUJu88mOqFhobduyLDEVFdiw
Sorry for no high tech link or embed, im a big time forum noob haha :)


The Dragonblood Throne is a new player home in Skyrim!

Located atop the mountain just west of Whiterun, is a fortress fit for a Dragonborn. The entrance is located on the western side of the mountain, just look for the giant dragon head carved out of stone. 

Inside lie two distinct areas; the throne room itself and the sanctuary.
The throne boasts Dwemer machinery powered by lava, while surrounded by dragon skeletons.
The sanctuary holds crafting stations for every profession, and multiple display cases and mannequins should keep the collectors happy. Two merchants can be found inside also. 

Outside on the mountain are multiple balcony's to afford the player spectacular views of the area. New mine added to exterior with update 1.2.

Requirements:
Dawnguard, Dragonborn and Skyrim patch 1.9 are needed.
Other than that this is a standalone plugin and should not affect any other in anyway. The exception would be another mod that changes the mountain that the fortress is built on.

Installation:
Download The Dragonblood Throne.esp with NMM and your good to go.
For manual installation unzip the file and place it into your skyrim data folder. The path usually is (C:/programfiles/steam/steamapps/commom/skyrim/data)

To Uninstall:
Delete TheDragonbloodThrone.esp from the skyrim data folder.
Warning!!! if you uninstall it while you have items still on mannequins, display racks etc. they will be gone.

Known issues:
Exterior navmeshes around the mountain and balcony's are a mess, may affect followers ability to follow. I don't use followers so I wont bother fixing it.
For some reason the mannequins like to move, I have not seen it yet with this place but if it happens, just leave the cell and then enter it again.

Update 1.2
-fixed map icons being initially discovered

Update 1.1
-fixed lava damage in forge area
-fixed lighting issues in sancutary (removed blue lights)

Thanks for everyone who makes mod videos and tutorials (big help btw)
Big thanks to Bethesda for making Skyrim and the Elderscrolls series!!!!
author: ScottyP
